instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850-B freezes shortly after boot.
threads.message:
This board freezes shortly after boot (the globe stops spinning)
I've try replacing C9560 and nothing.
I've try different rams.
Any suggestions?

threads.title: 820-2850-B freezes shortly after boot.
threads.message: Did you use hot air to replace C9560? Could be anything any history liquid drop etc?

threads.title: 820-2850-B freezes shortly after boot.
threads.message:
Can you run ASD?
Could be GPU issue, but try first clean ME BIOS.

threads.title: 820-2850-B freezes shortly after boot.
threads.message:
I will try that.
Thank you.
